analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa /

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩ'khrul pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad pa'i //

original: thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal nas //üîΩgtan tshigs tshul gsum 'khor lo yi //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal nas // gtan tshigs tshul gsum 'khor lo yi //
translated: Having paid homage to the Omniscient One,üîΩwho destroys the net of delusion,üîΩI will explain the ascertainment

original: gtan la dbab pa bshad par bya //
analyzed: gtan la dbab pa bshad par bya //
translated: of the wheel of the three modes of reasoning.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la //
translated: Regarding what is to be inferred,

original: yod dang med dang gnyis ka yi //
analyzed: yod dang med dang gnyis ka yi //
translated: existence, nonexistence, and both

original: yod pa la ni yang dag ste //
analyzed: yod pa la ni yang dag ste //
translated: are established as existent,

original: med dang gnyis ka ma grub yin ;
analyzed: med dang gnyis ka ma grub yin ;
translated: nonexistent, and not established, respectively.

original: / the tshom gnyis te ma grub bzhin //
analyzed: / the tshom gnyis te ma grub bzhin //
translated: Doubt is twofold, and nonestablishment is fourfold.

original: ma grub sbyar ba de bzhin du //
analyzed: ma grub sbyar ba de bzhin du //
translated: The application of nonestablishment is as follows:üîΩExistence and nonexistence in the similar class, likewise both,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang // med pa de bzhin gnyis ka dang // mi mthun phyogs la de bzhin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang // med pa de bzhin gnyis ka dang // mi mthun phyogs la de bzhin no //
translated: and in the dissimilar class.

original: gsum la rnam pa gsum gsum ste //
analyzed: gsum la rnam pa gsum gsum ste //
translated: In the three, there are three types each.

original: steng 'og gnyis la yang dag go //
analyzed: steng 'og gnyis la yang dag go //
translated: In the upper and lower, it is correct.

original: logs la 'gal ba gnyis yin te //
analyzed: logs la 'gal ba gnyis yin te //
translated: In the side, there are two contradictions.

original: zur bzhi thun mong ma nges bzhin //
analyzed: zur bzhi thun mong ma nges bzhin //
translated: The four corners are the uncommon inconclusive.

original: dbus na thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbus na thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: The center is the uncommon.

original: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung dang // mi rtag rtsol byung lus can min //
analyzed: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung dang // mi rtag rtsol byung lus can min //
translated: The object of comprehension is produced and impermanent, produced and audible, arisen from effort, impermanent and arisen from effort, not having a body,

original: rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung dang // rtag dang rtag dang rtag pa dang // rtsol byung min dang mi rtag dang // rtag pa la ni sgrub pa bkod //
analyzed: rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung dang // rtag dang rtag dang rtag pa dang // rtsol byung min dang mi rtag dang // rtag pa la ni sgrub pa bkod //
translated: permanent and arisen from effort, permanent and permanent, permanent and not arisen from effort, impermanent and permanent, and permanent are the established syllogisms.

original: steng 'og mi mthun logs dang sbyar //
analyzed: steng 'og mi mthun logs dang sbyar //
translated: The upper and lower are not compatible, and the sides are connected.

original: yang dag gtan tshigs gnyis yin no //
analyzed: yang dag gtan tshigs gnyis yin no //
translated: These are the two correct reasons.

original: logs dang mi mthun steng 'og sbyar //
analyzed: logs dang mi mthun steng 'og sbyar //
translated: The sides and the upper and lower are not compatible, and are connected.

original: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs gnyis yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs gnyis yin no //
translated: These are the two contradictory reasons.

original: zur bzhi tha dad snol mar sbyar //
analyzed: zur bzhi tha dad snol mar sbyar //
translated: The four corners are different, and are connected in a crisscross.

original: thun mong ma nges rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: thun mong ma nges rnam pa bzhi //
translated: These are the four types of uncommon inconclusive.

original: logs gnyis thad kar sbyar bas ni //
analyzed: logs gnyis thad kar sbyar bas ni //
translated: The two sides are connected in a straight line.

original: thun mong ma yin ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin ma nges pa'o //
translated: This is the uncommon inconclusive.

original: gtan tshigs 'khrul 'khor rnam dgu yis //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'khrul 'khor rnam dgu yis //
translated: By the nine types of syllogistic reasons,

original: dpe yi rnam pa 'di lta ste //
analyzed: dpe yi rnam pa 'di lta ste //
translated: the types of examples are as follows.

original: nam mkha' bum dang bum mkha' dang // bum pa glog dang nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha' bum dang bum mkha' dang // bum pa glog dang nam mkha' bzhin //
translated: Space, a pot, a pot‚Äôs space,üîΩa pot, a flash of lightning, and space.üîΩSpace, a pot, a flash of lightning,üîΩa flash of lightning, space, a pot,üîΩa pot, a flash of lightning, and space,

original: mkha' dang bum pa glog bzhin dang // glog dang nam mkha' bum bzhin dang // bum dang glog dang mkha' bzhin dang // nam mkha' rdul phran las bum bzhin //
analyzed: mkha' dang bum pa glog bzhin dang // glog dang nam mkha' bum bzhin dang // bum dang glog dang mkha' bzhin dang // nam mkha' rdul phran las bum bzhin //
translated: and space, a pot, and particles.

original: de ni nges pa'i dbang byas yin //
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i dbang byas yin //
translated: That is the way it is ascertained.

original: the tshom za ba'i lugs la ni //
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i lugs la ni //
translated: In a system of doubt,üîΩexistence, nonexistence, both existence and nonexistence,

original: yod dang med dang yod med dang // phyogs gcig mtha' dag sbyor bas so //
analyzed: yod dang med dang yod med dang // phyogs gcig mtha' dag sbyor bas so //
translated: and application to one part or all are refuted.

original: phyogs chos dgu'i 'khor lo slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: phyogs chos dgu'i 'khor lo slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The wheel of the nine properties of a reason is complete.

original: // / za hor gyi mkhas pa bo dhi satva dang / dge slong dharma a'a lo kas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / za hor gyi mkhas pa bo dhi satva dang / dge slong dharma a'a lo kas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
translated: It was translated, revised, and finalized by the Indian scholar Bodhisattva and the monk Dharma-aloka.
